name: Nidoking
flavorText:
It uses its
powerful tail in
battle to smash, constrict, then
break the prey's
bones.

previous.name: Nidorino
previous.flavorText:
An aggressive
POKéMON that is
quick to attack. The horn on its
head secretes a
powerful venom.

next.name: Clefairy
next.flavorText:
Its magical and
cute appeal has
many admirers. It is rare and
found only in
certain areas.

pokemon.name: Nidoran♂
pokemon.flavorText:
Stiffens its ears
to sense danger.
The larger its horns, the more
powerful its
secreted venom.
